library(teal.modules.general)

custom_footer <- tags$div(
  style = "text-align: center; padding: 10px; background-color: #ecf0f1; color: #34495e;",
  shiny::tags$p("Â© 2024 Clinical Research Organization"),
  shiny::tags$p("For questions contact: data-team@example.com"),
  shiny::tags$small("Version 1.0 | Last updated: 2024")
)

app <- teal::init(
  data = teal.data::teal_data(IRIS = iris),
  modules = teal::modules(
    teal.modules.general::tm_data_table("Data Explorer", datanames = "IRIS")

if (interactive()) {
  shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
} else {
  shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)
}
